.class public auto ansi sealed SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler(sender As Object, e As SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs)
public delegate void SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs ^ e);
type SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler = delegate of obj * SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs -> unit

span.span: The source of the event, the control.
A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 控件的 、 和 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the , , and events of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理 事件，以便执行任何预处理步骤，如在执行数据库操作之前，将参数添加到中 包含的对象 来捕获输出参数的值。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event to perform any preprocessing steps, such as adding a parameter to the object contained by the to capture the value of an output parameter, before a database action is performed. 在此示例中 ，通过使用存储过程，使用典型的主-从方案中的控件执行插入操作。In this example an insert is performed by a control in a classic master-detail scenario, using a stored procedure. 在 操作完成后引发事件时，将检查输出参数的值，该参数表示新插入的行的主键。The value of the output parameter, which represents the primary key of the newly inserted row, is examined when the event is raised after the operation completes. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何处理 控件引发的事件 ，以便可以取消 与控件关联的控件执行的数据库操作 。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event raised by the control, to possibly cancel a database action performed by a control associated with the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_6sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_6sql/CS/sql6cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_6sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_6sql/VB/sql6vb.aspx#1)]
